rooms.name: South corridor
rooms.description: You are in a tight corridor. A ceiling window provides some light around you.

rooms.name: Secret Stash
rooms.description: Congratulations! You found the secret stash!

rooms.name: Small Cupboard
rooms.description: You find yourself in a small cupboard. There are some empty shelves nearby. The only light eminates from the crack between the floor and the door.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: This appears to be the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Main Hall
rooms.description: A slightly larger hallway. A skylight provides illumination, making your wonder what is better: not seeing anything because of absense of light or not seeing anything because there simply is nothing to see?

rooms.name: East corridor
rooms.description: You are in a tight corridor. There are some storage shelves left of you.

rooms.name: Choose door
rooms.description: There are three doors in this room. Which one do you choose?

inventory.name: Empty oil lamp
inventory.description: This lamp should provide enough light, when it has fuel (which it hasn't).
